boardgame.name: DungeonQuest Edición revisada
Dungeonquest Neuauflage
DungeonQuest Revised Edition
ダンジョンクエスト・クラシック
地城任務
boardgame.description: DungeonQuest Revised Edition is a fast-paced game of dungeon exploration and looting for one to four players. You take on the role of a hero who sets out to explore Dragonfire Dungeon and claim more treasure than your rivals. Along the way, you'll need to evade traps, battle monsters, and find your way through the labyrinthian dungeon, all while trying to avoid waking the dragon who sleeps atop the treasure heap at the dungeon's heart. The player who gathers the most loot _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and makes it out of the dungeon alive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; is victorious!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This new edition of DungeonQuest features a streamlined combat system that harkens back to the classic editions of the game, and a deadlier dungeon than ever before. The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Torchlight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; variant offers you a new way to explore the dungeon's depths, while building an even more complex and sprawling dungeon throughout the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

DungeonQuest Revised Edition is a fast-paced game of deadly dungeon exploration and looting for one to four players. Manic, hilarious _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; fun, especially with a few drinks. This is THE Roguelike experience. Why am I selling? I love this game, but played a few times and my group prefers heavier games. oh well. Game in Excellent condition. This is the latest Revised edition.. which you can see on Amazon, but is currently unavailable Want to be inspired? See this review https://boardgamegeek.com/thread/1737567/review-336-deskovehry-dungeonquest-revised-edition I can only ship to the Uk. UK shipping will be £5 as it is heavy.
